content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257212,"originalJapaneseLine":"と意味深な終わり方","translatedEnglishLine":"And a suggestive ending"},{"lineNumber":257213,"originalJapaneseLine":"準備フェイズのイベントです。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is an event in the preparation phase."},{"lineNumber":257214,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこかの平原、ランスアターっくと必殺技でモンスターか魔軍を倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"On some plain, Rance attacks and defeats monsters or the demon army with a special move."},{"lineNumber":257215,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、瀕死の状態で敵は起き上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the enemy rises again in a near-death state."},{"lineNumber":257216,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは、再度攻撃を加えて倒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance attacks again and defeats it."},{"lineNumber":257217,"originalJapaneseLine":"お見事ですランス様とシィルが拍手するが、不満そうなランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well done, Lord Rance,\" cheers Shir, but Rance looks dissatisfied."},{"lineNumber":257218,"originalJapaneseLine":"この程度の奴を一撃で殺せないとは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"To think I can't kill someone this weak in a single blow..."},{"lineNumber":257219,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないです、この辺りの敵はかなり強いですし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It can't be helped; the enemies around here are quite strong..."},{"lineNumber":257220,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、ボス敵ならともかく、この程度は一撃でないといけない。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, unless it's a boss enemy, this level should be taken down in one hit."},{"lineNumber":257221,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様はそういうすごい存在なのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I am that kind of amazing existence."},{"lineNumber":257222,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと特訓をしてくる。シィルついてこい","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going for some training. Shir, come with me."},{"lineNumber":257223,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":257224,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":257225,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, Command Center"},{"lineNumber":257226,"originalJapaneseLine":"て、この忙しい時期にランスさんはどこにいったのですかー","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, where did Rance go during this busy time?"},{"lineNumber":257227,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルさんと共に２日間音信不通です。","translatedEnglishLine":"He has been out of contact for two days along with Shir."},{"lineNumber":257228,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにランスとシィルが戻ってくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and Shir return there."},{"lineNumber":257229,"originalJapaneseLine":"必殺技の修業をしてきた、もちろん習得した。さすが俺様だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I have trained in special moves, of course, I mastered them. As expected of me."},{"lineNumber":257230,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、朝、玉座","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, Morning, Throne"},{"lineNumber":257231,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝食が済んだランス、ビスケッタさんの入れた紅茶を飲んでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"After breakfast, Rance drinks the tea brewed by Biscetta."},{"lineNumber":257232,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルがいう、参謀本部の方から本日の予定を早く決めて欲しいと連絡が来ていますが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Shir says, we have received a message from the staff headquarters asking us to quickly decide today's schedule..."},{"lineNumber":257233,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日か、今日はだな・・うーん、いまいちノリがよくない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Today, huh? Well... hmm, I'm not really in the mood."},{"lineNumber":257234,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、でも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh, but..."},{"lineNumber":257235,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばかもん、この準備段階ではあわてて動いて疲れてどうする。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fool, what’s the point of rushing and exhausting yourself during this preparation stage?"},{"lineNumber":257236,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様がやらねばいけない事は、この後の本番の作戦だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"What I must do is the real operation coming up."},{"lineNumber":257237,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、それにそなえて今は休むのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"So, for that, I will rest now."},{"lineNumber":257238,"originalJapaneseLine":"汎用なので　短くシンプルに","translatedEnglishLine":"Since this is generic, keep it short and simple."},{"lineNumber":257239,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, Command Center"},{"lineNumber":257240,"originalJapaneseLine":"参謀達が飛び回っている・・各方面、どこもピンチ","translatedEnglishLine":"The staff officers are running around... every front is in crisis."},{"lineNumber":257241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　条件：５ターン以降、滅亡している地域、完全解放している地域はありません","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: After turn 5, there are no regions that have been destroyed or fully liberated."},{"lineNumber":257242,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでにランスがあっちこっち支援作戦に出て、魔人も退治している状態。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has already gone here and there on support operations and has also defeated warlocks."},{"lineNumber":257243,"originalJapaneseLine":"各方面から総統が指揮する魔人討伐隊の支援要請が来ている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Requests for support from the warlock extermination squads under the Supreme Commander are coming from all fronts."},{"lineNumber":257244,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様をあてにしすぎだ、疲れたぞ・・と若干文句を言うランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance complains a little, 'You're relying on me too much, I'm tired...'."},{"lineNumber":257245,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたがないです、魔人を要する魔軍に対抗出来るのはランス総統しかいません","translatedEnglishLine":"It can't be helped; only Supreme Commander Rance can oppose the demon army with warlocks."},{"lineNumber":257246,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の中でランス総統の名はだいぶ知れ渡っています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the demon army, the name of Supreme Commander Rance is quite well known."},{"lineNumber":257247,"originalJapaneseLine":"たとえ短時間でもランス総統が現れて戦うと魔軍は警戒して動きにくくなります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if only for a short time, when Supreme Commander Rance appears and fights, the demon army becomes cautious and finds it hard to move."},{"lineNumber":257248,"originalJapaneseLine":"全ての地域でちょっとずつでも戦えば、だいぶ各方面が助かるという訳か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If we fight even a little in all regions, then each front will be greatly helped..."},{"lineNumber":257249,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、ですが・・各方面を移動するには距離がありすぎますし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, but... the distances between fronts are too great to move around..."},{"lineNumber":257250,"originalJapaneseLine":"女達が俺様を頼りにしているのだ、いっちょいってやるぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"The women are relying on me, so let's do this!"},{"lineNumber":257251,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tリーザスに到着、戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at Lezas, battle begins."},{"lineNumber":257252,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tリーザスに到着した。リーザス平原などで・・城である必要はないです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at Lezas. It can be on the Lezas plains, etc., no need for it to be a castle."},{"lineNumber":257253,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t最速で移動してきた。よーし、魔軍には俺様が魔人退治に現れたぞと","translatedEnglishLine":"I've moved here at top speed. Alright, let the demon army think I, the great one, have appeared to exterminate warlocks."},{"lineNumber":257254,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t思わせたらそれでいい、目立ちながら少し戦うぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's enough to make them think so; I will fight a little while standing out."},{"lineNumber":257255,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tがはははは、俺様率いる魔人討伐隊参上ー","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha! The warlock extermination squad led by me has arrived!"},{"lineNumber":257256,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞魔物隊長あたりとの戦闘後","translatedEnglishLine":"After battle with a monster captain or so."},{"lineNumber":257257,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t魔物兵が逃げて行く、人類最強部隊だ・・俺達ではかなわないーにげろー","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster soldiers flee, 'It's the strongest human unit... We can't win, run away!'"},{"lineNumber":257258,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tがははは、よし、リーザスはこれでいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, alright, this should do for Lezas."},{"lineNumber":257259,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t次行くぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's move to the next."},{"lineNumber":257260,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tト書き","translatedEnglishLine":"[Narration]"},{"lineNumber":257261,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　このクエストのみの例外処理","translatedEnglishLine":"This is an exception processing only for this quest."},{"lineNumber":257262,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　クエスト中に戦果マークを取得する事はありませんが","translatedEnglishLine":"During the quest, you will not acquire victory markers,"},{"lineNumber":257263,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　クリア時に全ての地域に戦果マークが１つ追加されます","translatedEnglishLine":"but upon clearing, one victory mark will be added to every region."},{"lineNumber":257264,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t自由都市に到着した。Ｍランドである必要は無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Free City. It doesn't have to be an M-Land."},{"lineNumber":257265,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tはぁはぁ、最速うし車で１日で到着したぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Huff, huff, I arrived in one day with the fastest ox cart."},{"lineNumber":257266,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tむっちゃ揺れたかからケツがいたい","translatedEnglishLine":"It shook a lot, so my rear end hurts."},{"lineNumber":257267,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t自由都市地域でも少し戦いましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's fight a little in the Free City area as well."},{"lineNumber":257268,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tああ、わかっている。いくぞー、ランス参上ー","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I know. Let's go—Rance is here!"},{"lineNumber":257269,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞魔物隊長あたりとの戦闘後","translatedEnglishLine":"After a battle with a monster captain or so."},{"lineNumber":257270,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t魔物兵が逃げて行く、魔人を倒した化け物人間ぶたいだーにげろー","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster soldiers flee, 'It's the monstrous human unit that defeated the warlocks—run!'"},{"lineNumber":257271,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t大将軍ピサロ様に報告するのだー","translatedEnglishLine":"Report this to Great General Pizarro!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と意味深な終わり方
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And a suggestive ending

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備フェイズのイベントです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an event in the preparation phase.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかの平原、ランスアターっくと必殺技でモンスターか魔軍を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On some plain, Rance attacks and defeats monsters or the demon army with a special move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、瀕死の状態で敵は起き上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the enemy rises again in a near-death state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、再度攻撃を加えて倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance attacks again and defeats it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お見事ですランス様とシィルが拍手するが、不満そうなランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well done, Lord Rance," cheers Shir, but Rance looks dissatisfied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この程度の奴を一撃で殺せないとは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think I can't kill someone this weak in a single blow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないです、この辺りの敵はかなり強いですし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped; the enemies around here are quite strong...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、ボス敵ならともかく、この程度は一撃でないといけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, unless it's a boss enemy, this level should be taken down in one hit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様はそういうすごい存在なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am that kind of amazing existence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと特訓をしてくる。シィルついてこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going for some training. Shir, come with me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Command Center

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: て、この忙しい時期にランスさんはどこにいったのですかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, where did Rance go during this busy time?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんと共に２日間音信不通です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has been out of contact for two days along with Shir.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスとシィルが戻ってくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Shir return there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必殺技の修業をしてきた、もちろん習得した。さすが俺様だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have trained in special moves, of course, I mastered them. As expected of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、朝、玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Morning, Throne

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝食が済んだランス、ビスケッタさんの入れた紅茶を飲んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After breakfast, Rance drinks the tea brewed by Biscetta.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがいう、参謀本部の方から本日の予定を早く決めて欲しいと連絡が来ていますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shir says, we have received a message from the staff headquarters asking us to quickly decide today's schedule...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日か、今日はだな・・うーん、いまいちノリがよくない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, huh? Well... hmm, I'm not really in the mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかもん、この準備段階ではあわてて動いて疲れてどうする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fool, what’s the point of rushing and exhausting yourself during this preparation stage?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がやらねばいけない事は、この後の本番の作戦だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What I must do is the real operation coming up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、それにそなえて今は休むのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, for that, I will rest now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用なので　短くシンプルに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since this is generic, keep it short and simple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Command Center

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参謀達が飛び回っている・・各方面、どこもピンチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The staff officers are running around... every front is in crisis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：５ターン以降、滅亡している地域、完全解放している地域はありません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: After turn 5, there are no regions that have been destroyed or fully liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにランスがあっちこっち支援作戦に出て、魔人も退治している状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has already gone here and there on support operations and has also defeated warlocks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各方面から総統が指揮する魔人討伐隊の支援要請が来ている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Requests for support from the warlock extermination squads under the Supreme Commander are coming from all fronts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様をあてにしすぎだ、疲れたぞ・・と若干文句を言うランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance complains a little, 'You're relying on me too much, I'm tired...'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたがないです、魔人を要する魔軍に対抗出来るのはランス総統しかいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped; only Supreme Commander Rance can oppose the demon army with warlocks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の中でランス総統の名はだいぶ知れ渡っています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the demon army, the name of Supreme Commander Rance is quite well known.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たとえ短時間でもランス総統が現れて戦うと魔軍は警戒して動きにくくなります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if only for a short time, when Supreme Commander Rance appears and fights, the demon army becomes cautious and finds it hard to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての地域でちょっとずつでも戦えば、だいぶ各方面が助かるという訳か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we fight even a little in all regions, then each front will be greatly helped...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、ですが・・各方面を移動するには距離がありすぎますし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, but... the distances between fronts are too great to move around...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女達が俺様を頼りにしているのだ、いっちょいってやるぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The women are relying on me, so let's do this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスに到着、戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Lezas, battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスに到着した。リーザス平原などで・・城である必要はないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Lezas. It can be on the Lezas plains, etc., no need for it to be a castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最速で移動してきた。よーし、魔軍には俺様が魔人退治に現れたぞと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've moved here at top speed. Alright, let the demon army think I, the great one, have appeared to exterminate warlocks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わせたらそれでいい、目立ちながら少し戦うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's enough to make them think so; I will fight a little while standing out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、俺様率いる魔人討伐隊参上ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha! The warlock extermination squad led by me has arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞魔物隊長あたりとの戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After battle with a monster captain or so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵が逃げて行く、人類最強部隊だ・・俺達ではかなわないーにげろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldiers flee, 'It's the strongest human unit... We can't win, run away!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、よし、リーザスはこれでいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, alright, this should do for Lezas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次行くぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's move to the next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ト書き
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Narration]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエストのみの例外処理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an exception processing only for this quest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト中に戦果マークを取得する事はありませんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the quest, you will not acquire victory markers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリア時に全ての地域に戦果マークが１つ追加されます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but upon clearing, one victory mark will be added to every region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市に到着した。Ｍランドである必要は無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Free City. It doesn't have to be an M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁはぁ、最速うし車で１日で到着したぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huff, huff, I arrived in one day with the fastest ox cart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むっちゃ揺れたかからケツがいたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It shook a lot, so my rear end hurts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地域でも少し戦いましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's fight a little in the Free City area as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、わかっている。いくぞー、ランス参上ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I know. Let's go—Rance is here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞魔物隊長あたりとの戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a battle with a monster captain or so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵が逃げて行く、魔人を倒した化け物人間ぶたいだーにげろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldiers flee, 'It's the monstrous human unit that defeated the warlocks—run!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ピサロ様に報告するのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report this to Great General Pizarro!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

We can't win, run away!'"},{"lineNumber":257258,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tがははは、よし、リーザスはこれでいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, alright, this should do for Lezas."},{"lineNumber":257259,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t次行くぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's move to the next."},{"lineNumber":257260,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tト書き","translatedEnglishLine":"[Narration]"},{"lineNumber":257261,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　このクエストのみの例外処理","translatedEnglishLine":"This is an exception processing only for this quest."},{"lineNumber":257262,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　クエスト中に戦果マークを取得する事はありませんが","translatedEnglishLine":"During the quest, you will not acquire victory markers,"},{"lineNumber":257263,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　クリア時に全ての地域に戦果マークが１つ追加されます","translatedEnglishLine":"but upon clearing, one victory mark will be added to every region."},{"lineNumber":257264,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t自由都市に到着した。Ｍランドである必要は無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Free City. translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と意味深な終わり方
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And a suggestive ending

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備フェイズのイベントです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an event in the preparation phase.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかの平原、ランスアターっくと必殺技でモンスターか魔軍を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On some plain, Rance attacks and defeats monsters or the demon army with a special move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、瀕死の状態で敵は起き上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the enemy rises again in a near-death state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、再度攻撃を加えて倒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance attacks again and defeats it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お見事ですランス様とシィルが拍手するが、不満そうなランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well done, Lord Rance," cheers Shir, but Rance looks dissatisfied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この程度の奴を一撃で殺せないとは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think I can't kill someone this weak in a single blow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないです、この辺りの敵はかなり強いですし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped; the enemies around here are quite strong...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、ボス敵ならともかく、この程度は一撃でないといけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, unless it's a boss enemy, this level should be taken down in one hit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様はそういうすごい存在なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am that kind of amazing existence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと特訓をしてくる。シィルついてこい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going for some training. Shir, come with me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Command Center

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: て、この忙しい時期にランスさんはどこにいったのですかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, where did Rance go during this busy time?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんと共に２日間音信不通です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has been out of contact for two days along with Shir.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスとシィルが戻ってくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Shir return there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必殺技の修業をしてきた、もちろん習得した。さすが俺様だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have trained in special moves, of course, I mastered them. As expected of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、朝、玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Morning, Throne

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝食が済んだランス、ビスケッタさんの入れた紅茶を飲んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After breakfast, Rance drinks the tea brewed by Biscetta.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがいう、参謀本部の方から本日の予定を早く決めて欲しいと連絡が来ていますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shir says, we have received a message from the staff headquarters asking us to quickly decide today's schedule...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日か、今日はだな・・うーん、いまいちノリがよくない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, huh? Well... hmm, I'm not really in the mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかもん、この準備段階ではあわてて動いて疲れてどうする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fool, what’s the point of rushing and exhausting yourself during this preparation stage?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がやらねばいけない事は、この後の本番の作戦だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What I must do is the real operation coming up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、それにそなえて今は休むのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, for that, I will rest now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用なので　短くシンプルに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since this is generic, keep it short and simple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Command Center

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参謀達が飛び回っている・・各方面、どこもピンチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The staff officers are running around... every front is in crisis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：５ターン以降、滅亡している地域、完全解放している地域はありません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: After turn 5, there are no regions that have been destroyed or fully liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにランスがあっちこっち支援作戦に出て、魔人も退治している状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has already gone here and there on support operations and has also defeated warlocks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各方面から総統が指揮する魔人討伐隊の支援要請が来ている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Requests for support from the warlock extermination squads under the Supreme Commander are coming from all fronts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様をあてにしすぎだ、疲れたぞ・・と若干文句を言うランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance complains a little, 'You're relying on me too much, I'm tired...'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたがないです、魔人を要する魔軍に対抗出来るのはランス総統しかいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can't be helped; only Supreme Commander Rance can oppose the demon army with warlocks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の中でランス総統の名はだいぶ知れ渡っています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the demon army, the name of Supreme Commander Rance is quite well known.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たとえ短時間でもランス総統が現れて戦うと魔軍は警戒して動きにくくなります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if only for a short time, when Supreme Commander Rance appears and fights, the demon army becomes cautious and finds it hard to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての地域でちょっとずつでも戦えば、だいぶ各方面が助かるという訳か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we fight even a little in all regions, then each front will be greatly helped...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、ですが・・各方面を移動するには距離がありすぎますし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, but... the distances between fronts are too great to move around...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女達が俺様を頼りにしているのだ、いっちょいってやるぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The women are relying on me, so let's do this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスに到着、戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Lezas, battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスに到着した。リーザス平原などで・・城である必要はないです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Lezas. It can be on the Lezas plains, etc., no need for it to be a castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最速で移動してきた。よーし、魔軍には俺様が魔人退治に現れたぞと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've moved here at top speed. Alright, let the demon army think I, the great one, have appeared to exterminate warlocks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わせたらそれでいい、目立ちながら少し戦うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's enough to make them think so; I will fight a little while standing out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、俺様率いる魔人討伐隊参上ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha! The warlock extermination squad led by me has arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞魔物隊長あたりとの戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After battle with a monster captain or so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵が逃げて行く、人類最強部隊だ・・俺達ではかなわないーにげろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldiers flee, 'It's the strongest human unit... We can't win, run away!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、よし、リーザスはこれでいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, alright, this should do for Lezas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次行くぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's move to the next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ト書き
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Narration]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエストのみの例外処理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an exception processing only for this quest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト中に戦果マークを取得する事はありませんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the quest, you will not acquire victory markers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリア時に全ての地域に戦果マークが１つ追加されます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but upon clearing, one victory mark will be added to every region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市に到着した。Ｍランドである必要は無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Free City. It doesn't have to be an M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁはぁ、最速うし車で１日で到着したぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huff, huff, I arrived in one day with the fastest ox cart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むっちゃ揺れたかからケツがいたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It shook a lot, so my rear end hurts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地域でも少し戦いましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's fight a little in the Free City area as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、わかっている。いくぞー、ランス参上ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I know. Let's go—Rance is here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞魔物隊長あたりとの戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a battle with a monster captain or so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵が逃げて行く、魔人を倒した化け物人間ぶたいだーにげろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldiers flee, 'It's the monstrous human unit that defeated the warlocks—run!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ピサロ様に報告するのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report this to Great General Pizarro!
